trans-unit.source: The <see langword="Constants" /> module contains miscellaneous constants.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Constants" /> 模块包含杂项常数。

trans-unit.source: These constants can be used anywhere in your code.
trans-unit.target: 这些常量可以在代码中的任何地方使用。

trans-unit.source: This module supports the Visual Basic language constants that correspond to the members of many Visual Basic enumerations:
trans-unit.target: 此模块支持许多 Visual Basic 枚举的成员所对应的 Visual Basic 语言常量：

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the <see langword="Abort" /> button was clicked in a message box.
trans-unit.target: 指示在某个消息框中单击了 <see langword="Abort" /> 按钮。

trans-unit.source: Returned by the <see langword="MsgBox" /> function.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see langword="MsgBox" /> 函数返回。

trans-unit.source: When you call the `MsgBox` function, you can use the `MsgBoxResult` enumeration in your code in place of the actual values.
trans-unit.target: 当调用`MsgBox`函数，你可以使用`MsgBoxResult`代替实际值在代码中的枚举。

trans-unit.source: The `MsgBox` function returns a `MsgBoxResult` enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: `MsgBox`函数返回`MsgBoxResult`枚举值。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the <see langword="Abort" />, <see langword="Retry" />, and <see langword="Ignore" /> buttons will be displayed when the <see langword="MsgBox" /> function is called.
trans-unit.target: 指示在调用 <see langword="Abort" /> 函数时，将显示 <see langword="Retry" />、<see langword="Ignore" /> 和 <see langword="MsgBox" /> 按钮。

trans-unit.source: When you call the `MsgBox` function, you can use the `MsgBoxStyle` enumeration in your code in place of the actual values.
trans-unit.target: 当调用`MsgBox`函数，你可以使用`MsgBoxStyle`代替实际值在代码中的枚举。

trans-unit.source: The `Buttons` argument takes the `MsgBoxStyle` enumeration members.
trans-unit.target: `Buttons`参数采用`MsgBoxStyle`枚举成员。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the message box will be displayed as a modal dialog box when the <see langword="MsgBox" /> function is called.
trans-unit.target: 指示在调用 <see langword="MsgBox" /> 函数时，将消息框显示为模式对话框。

trans-unit.source: When you call the `MsgBox` function, you can use the `MsgBoxStyle` enumeration in your code in place of the actual values.
trans-unit.target: 当调用`MsgBox`函数，你可以使用`MsgBoxStyle`代替实际值在代码中的枚举。

trans-unit.source: The `Buttons` argument takes the `MsgBoxStyle` enumeration members.
trans-unit.target: `Buttons`参数采用`MsgBoxStyle`枚举成员。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the file has changed since the last backup operation for file-access functions.
trans-unit.target: 指示自最后一次针对文件访问函数执行备份操作以来该文件已发生更改。

trans-unit.source: When you call the `Dir`, `GetAttr`, or `SetAttr` functions, you can use the `FileAttribute` enumeration in your code in place of the actual values.
trans-unit.target: 当调用`Dir`， `GetAttr`，或`SetAttr`函数，你可以使用`FileAttribute`代替实际值在代码中的枚举。

trans-unit.source: The `Attributes` argument takes the `FileAttribute` enumeration members.
trans-unit.target: `Attributes`参数采用`FileAttribute`枚举成员。

trans-unit.source: When performing file I/O operations, the `My.Computer.FileSystem` object provides greater performance and ease of use than legacy file I/O methods.
trans-unit.target: 执行文件 I/O 操作时`My.Computer.FileSystem`对象提供更高的性能和易用性比传统的文件 I/O 的方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.FileSystem> object.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.FileSystem>对象。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the type of a variant object is an array.
trans-unit.target: 指示变量对象的类型为数组。

trans-unit.source: Returned by the <see langword="VarType" /> function.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see langword="VarType" /> 函数返回。

trans-unit.source: When you call the `VarType` function, you can use enumeration members in your code in place of the actual values.
trans-unit.target: 当调用`VarType`函数，来代替实际值在代码中，可以使用枚举成员。

trans-unit.source: The `VariantType` enumeration defines constants used to identify possible `Variant` types.
trans-unit.target: `VariantType`枚举定义常量用于标识可能`Variant`类型。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the `VariantType` enumeration members.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出`VariantType`枚举成员。

trans-unit.source: Represents a backspace character for print and display functions.
trans-unit.target: 表示用于打印和显示功能的退格符。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that a binary comparison should be performed when comparison functions are called.
trans-unit.target: 指定在调用比较函数时应执行二进制比较。

trans-unit.source: When you call comparison functions, you can use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.CompareMethod> enumeration in your code in place of the actual values.
trans-unit.target: 比较函数调用时，你可以使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.CompareMethod>代替实际值在代码中的枚举。

trans-unit.source: The `Compare` argument takes the `CompareMethod` enumeration members.
trans-unit.target: `Compare`参数采用`CompareMethod`枚举成员。

trans-unit.source: For binary and text comparisons, see [Option Compare Statement](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/option-compare-statement.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关二进制和文本比较，请参阅[选项比较语句](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/option-compare-statement.md)。

trans-unit.target: 表示用于打印和显示功能的回车符和换行符的组合。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the leftmost button is selected as the default button when the message box appears.
trans-unit.target: 指示在显示消息框时将最左侧的按钮作为默认按钮选中。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the exclamation icon will be displayed when the <see langword="MsgBox" /> function is called.
trans-unit.target: 指示在调用 <see langword="MsgBox" /> 函数时，将显示惊叹号图标。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that a <see langword="Boolean" /> value of <see langword="False" /> should be used when number-formatting functions are called.
trans-unit.target: 指示在调用数字格式设置函数时应使用 <see langword="Boolean" /> 值 <see langword="False" />。

trans-unit.source: When you call number-formatting functions, you can use the following enumeration members in your code in place of the actual values.
trans-unit.target: 当你调用数字格式的函数，你可以使用的实际值替换代码中的以下枚举成员。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the first week of the year that has at least four days should be used when date-related functions are called.
trans-unit.target: 指示在调用与日期相关的函数时，应使用一年中第一个至少包含四天的周。

trans-unit.source: When you call date-related functions, you can use the following enumeration members in your code in place of the actual values.
trans-unit.target: 在调用与日期相关的函数时，你可以代替实际值在代码中使用下列枚举成员。

trans-unit.source: Some date-related functions take a `DayOfWeek` argument, a `WeekOfYear` argument, or both.
trans-unit.target: 某些与日期相关函数采用`DayOfWeek`自变量，`WeekOfYear`参数或两者。

trans-unit.source: The `FirstWeekOfYear` enumeration specifies the valid values for the `WeekOfYear` arguments, as well as the possible return values from the functions.
trans-unit.target: `FirstWeekOfYear`枚举指定的有效值`WeekOfYear`自变量，以及可能的返回值从函数。

trans-unit.source: The `WeekOfYear` argument takes the `FirstWeekOfYear` enumeration members.
trans-unit.target: `WeekOfYear`参数采用`FirstWeekOfYear`枚举成员。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the first full week of the year should be used when date-related functions are called.
trans-unit.target: 指示在调用与日期相关的函数时，应使用一年中第一个完整的周。

trans-unit.source: When you call date-related functions, you can use the following enumeration members in your code in place of the actual values.
trans-unit.target: 在调用与日期相关的函数时，你可以代替实际值在代码中使用下列枚举成员。

trans-unit.source: Some date-related functions take a `DayOfWeek` argument, a `WeekOfYear` argument, or both.
trans-unit.target: 某些与日期相关函数采用`DayOfWeek`自变量，`WeekOfYear`参数或两者。

trans-unit.source: The `FirstWeekOfYear` enumeration specifies the valid values for the `WeekOfYear` arguments, as well as the possible return values from the functions.
trans-unit.target: `FirstWeekOfYear`枚举指定的有效值`WeekOfYear`自变量，以及可能的返回值从函数。

trans-unit.source: The `WeekOfYear` argument takes the `FirstWeekOfYear` enumeration members.
trans-unit.target: `WeekOfYear`参数采用`FirstWeekOfYear`枚举成员。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the week of the year in which January 1 occurs should be used when date-related functions are called.
trans-unit.target: 指示在调用与日期相关的函数时，应使用一年中 1 月 1 日所在的周。

trans-unit.source: When you call date-related functions, you can use the following enumeration members in your code in place of the actual values.
trans-unit.target: 在调用与日期相关的函数时，你可以代替实际值在代码中使用下列枚举成员。

trans-unit.source: Some date-related functions take a `DayOfWeek` argument, a `WeekOfYear` argument, or both.
trans-unit.target: 某些与日期相关函数采用`DayOfWeek`自变量，`WeekOfYear`参数或两者。

trans-unit.source: The `FirstWeekOfYear` enumeration specifies the valid values for the `WeekOfYear` arguments, as well as the possible return values from the functions.
trans-unit.target: `FirstWeekOfYear`枚举指定的有效值`WeekOfYear`自变量，以及可能的返回值从函数。

trans-unit.source: The `WeekOfYear` argument takes the `FirstWeekOfYear` enumeration members.
trans-unit.target: `WeekOfYear`参数采用`FirstWeekOfYear`枚举成员。

trans-unit.source: Represents a form-feed character for print functions.
trans-unit.target: 表示用于打印功能的换页符。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that Friday should be used as the first day of the week when date-related functions are called.
trans-unit.target: 指示在调用与日期相关的函数时，应将星期五用作一周的第一天。

trans-unit.source: When you call date-related functions, you can use the following enumeration members in your code in place of the actual values.
trans-unit.target: 在调用与日期相关的函数时，你可以代替实际值在代码中使用下列枚举成员。

trans-unit.source: Some date-related functions take a `DayOfWeek` argument, a `WeekOfYear` argument, or both.
trans-unit.target: 某些与日期相关函数采用`DayOfWeek`自变量，`WeekOfYear`参数或两者。

trans-unit.source: The `FirstDayOfWeek` enumeration specifies the valid values for the `DayOfWeek` arguments, as well as the possible return values from the functions.
trans-unit.target: `FirstDayOfWeek`枚举指定的有效值`DayOfWeek`自变量，以及可能的返回值从函数。

trans-unit.source: The `DayOfWeek` argument takes the `FirstDayOfWeek` enumeration members.
trans-unit.target: `DayOfWeek`参数采用`FirstDayOfWeek`枚举成员。

trans-unit.source: Date-related functions also return `FirstDayOfWeek` values (except `System`).
trans-unit.target: 与日期相关的函数还返回`FirstDayOfWeek`值 (除`System`)。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the general date format for the current culture should be used when the <see langword="FormatDateTime" /> function is called.
trans-unit.target: 指示在调用 <see langword="FormatDateTime" /> 函数时，应使用当前区域性的常规日期格式。

trans-unit.source: When you call the `FormatDateTime` function, you can use the following enumeration members in your code in place of the actual values.
trans-unit.target: 当调用`FormatDateTime`函数，你可以使用下列枚举成员来代替实际值在代码中。

trans-unit.source: You can access your computer's regional settings by double-clicking the **Regional Options** icon, found in **Control Panel**.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过双击访问你的计算机的区域设置**区域选项**图标，在中找到**控制面板**。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that a property value should be retrieved when the <see langword="CallByName" /> function is called.
trans-unit.target: 指定在调用 <see langword="CallByName" /> 函数时，应检索一个属性值。

trans-unit.source: When you call the `CallByName` function, you can use the following `CallType` enumeration members in your code in place of the actual values.
trans-unit.target: 当调用`CallByName`函数，你可以使用以下`CallType`代替实际值在代码中的枚举成员。

trans-unit.source: The `UseCallType` argument takes the `CallType` enumeration members.
trans-unit.target: `UseCallType`参数采用`CallType`枚举成员。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the file is a hidden file for file-access functions.
trans-unit.target: 指示该文件是包含文件访问函数的隐藏文件。

trans-unit.source: When you call the `Dir`, `GetAttr`, or `SetAttr` functions, you can use the `FileAttribute` enumeration in your code in place of the actual values.

trans-unit.target: 此属性不是有效的`SetAttr`函数。

trans-unit.source: When you call the `Dir`, `GetAttr`, or `SetAttr` functions, you can use the `FileAttribute` enumeration in your code in place of the actual values.
trans-unit.target: 当调用`Dir`， `GetAttr`，或`SetAttr`函数，你可以使用`FileAttribute`代替实际值在代码中的枚举。

trans-unit.source: The `Attributes` argument takes the `FileAttribute` enumeration members.
trans-unit.target: `Attributes`参数采用`FileAttribute`枚举成员。

trans-unit.source: When performing file I/O operations, the `My.Computer.FileSystem` object provides greater performance and ease of use than legacy file I/O methods.
trans-unit.target: 执行文件 I/O 操作时`My.Computer.FileSystem`对象提供更高的性能和易用性比传统的文件 I/O 的方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.FileSystem> object.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.FileSystem>对象。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that Wednesday should be used as the first day of the week when date-related functions are called.
trans-unit.target: 指示在调用与日期相关的函数时，应将星期三用作一周的第一天。

trans-unit.source: When you call date-related functions, you can use the following enumeration members in your code in place of the actual values.
trans-unit.target: 在调用与日期相关的函数时，你可以代替实际值在代码中使用下列枚举成员。

trans-unit.source: Some date-related functions take a `DayOfWeek` argument, a `WeekOfYear` argument, or both.
trans-unit.target: 某些与日期相关函数采用`DayOfWeek`自变量，`WeekOfYear`参数或两者。

trans-unit.source: The `FirstDayOfWeek` enumeration specifies the valid values for the `DayOfWeek` arguments, as well as the possible return values from the functions.
trans-unit.target: `FirstDayOfWeek`枚举指定的有效值`DayOfWeek`自变量，以及可能的返回值从函数。

trans-unit.source: The `DayOfWeek` argument takes the `FirstDayOfWeek` enumeration members.
trans-unit.target: `DayOfWeek`参数采用`FirstDayOfWeek`枚举成员。

trans-unit.source: Date-related functions also return `FirstDayOfWeek` values (except `System`).
trans-unit.target: 与日期相关的函数还返回`FirstDayOfWeek`值 (除`System`)。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that narrow (single-byte) characters should be converted to wide (double-byte) characters when the <see langword="StrConv" /> function is called.
trans-unit.target: 指示在调用 <see langword="StrConv" /> 函数时，应将窄（单字节）字符转换为宽（双字节）字符。

trans-unit.source: When you call the `StrConv` function, you can use the following enumeration members in your code in place of the actual values.
trans-unit.target: 当调用`StrConv`函数，你可以使用下列枚举成员来代替实际值在代码中。

trans-unit.source: The `Conversion` argument takes the `VbStrConv` enumeration members.
trans-unit.target: `Conversion`参数采用`VbStrConv`枚举成员。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the <see langword="Yes" /> button was clicked in a message box.
trans-unit.target: 指示在某个消息框中单击了 <see langword="Yes" /> 按钮。

trans-unit.source: Returned by the <see langword="MsgBox" /> function.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see langword="MsgBox" /> 函数返回。

trans-unit.source: When you call the `MsgBox` function, you can use the `MsgBoxResult` enumeration in your code in place of the actual values.
trans-unit.target: 当调用`MsgBox`函数，你可以使用`MsgBoxResult`代替实际值在代码中的枚举。

trans-unit.source: The `MsgBox` function returns a `MsgBoxResult` enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: `MsgBox`函数返回`MsgBoxResult`枚举值。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the <see langword="Yes" /> and <see langword="No" /> buttons will be displayed when the <see langword="MsgBox" /> function is called.
trans-unit.target: 指示在调用 <see langword="Yes" /> 函数时，将显示 <see langword="No" /> 和 <see langword="MsgBox" /> 按钮。

trans-unit.source: When you call the `MsgBox` function, you can use the `MsgBoxStyle` enumeration in your code in place of the actual values.
trans-unit.target: 当调用`MsgBox`函数，你可以使用`MsgBoxStyle`代替实际值在代码中的枚举。

trans-unit.source: The `Buttons` argument takes the `MsgBoxStyle` enumeration members.
trans-unit.target: `Buttons`参数采用`MsgBoxStyle`枚举成员。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the <see langword="Yes" />, <see langword="No" />, and <see langword="Cancel" /> buttons will be displayed when the <see langword="MsgBox" /> function is called.
trans-unit.target: 指示在调用 <see langword="Yes" /> 函数时，将显示 <see langword="No" />、<see langword="Cancel" /> 和 <see langword="MsgBox" /> 按钮。

trans-unit.source: When you call the `MsgBox` function, you can use the `MsgBoxStyle` enumeration in your code in place of the actual values.
trans-unit.target: 当调用`MsgBox`函数，你可以使用`MsgBoxStyle`代替实际值在代码中的枚举。

trans-unit.source: The `Buttons` argument takes the `MsgBoxStyle` enumeration members.
trans-unit.target: `Buttons`参数采用`MsgBoxStyle`枚举成员。
